text: Bleak House is a novel by Charles Dickens, 1852/3. It features the long- running legal case in the Court of Chancery, Jarndyce and Jarndyce. This novel helped support a judicial reform movement which led to legal reform in the 1870s.Oldham, James. "A Profusion of Chancery Reform". Law and History Review. == References == Category:1850s books Category:Books by Charles Dickens
title: Bleak House
